name: Example4
description: This example have four circles with random colors but it makes the diameter grow and then decrese between 10 and 70. It also gives a random rotation direction to the elipses. It checks with an if statement if a random number is larger or smaller than 0.5, which is 50%/ 50% chance, and gives it a value of 1 or -1. Then when drawing the elipse, in the rotation I multiply this number by 'frameCount' and that is how I get the direction.

name: Drone show
description: The project will present a sequence of rotating circles to create different forms, simulating a drone light show. The images observed from the ground in drone light shows serve as inspiration. This will be done by using JavaScript and the p5.js package to create dynamic and generative art. To create a changing visual experience, I should play with grid layout, rotation, and animation using the code.
